pkgmetadata.longdescription: ![Python](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3670A0?style=Flat&logo=python&logoColor=ffdd54)[![Hatch project](https://img.shields.io/badge/%F0%9F%A5%9A-Hatch-4051b5.svg)](https://github.com/pypa/hatch)# PySelector (WIP)## ðŸŒŸ About`pyselector` is a Python wrapper for the `rofi` application, which provides a simple and efficient way to display a list of items for user selection.## ðŸ“¦ InstallationTo install `pyselector`, you can use pip:~~~shpip install pyselector~~~
